main package¶

This directory is the central database system for the website, profiles, and house points.

Helper function that looks up the links for the profile tabs

Parameters:
  • request – The request object used to generate this response.
  • template – The full name of a template to use or sequence of template names.
  • template_args – Variables to pass to the template
Returns:

Rendered template
